Ingredients.1: 8 ounces Genoa salami, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.2: 8 ounces sopressata or other hard salami, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.3: 8 ounces sharp provolone cheese, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.4: 8 ounces fresh mozzarella cheese, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.5: 2 large tomatoes, cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.6: 1 (14 ounce) can artichokes, drained and cut into bite-size pieces

Ingredients.8: 0.5 cup pitted and coarsely chopped Kalamata olives

Ingredients.9: 0.25 cup pitted and chopped green olives

Directions.1: Combine Genoa and soppressata salamis, provolone, mozzarella, tomatoes, and artichokes in a bowl. Slice roasted red peppers and add them to the bowl with about 3 tablespoons juice from the red pepper jar. Mix in chopped olives.

Directions.2: Drizzle olive oil over salami mixture, followed by red wine vinegar. Season with pepper. Mix thoroughly. Store in the refrigerator until serving time.

Directions.3: Before serving, tear fresh basil leaves into bite-sized pieces and fold them into salad.
